# Desiccate, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[6th Level Druid Spells|Druid 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[Thirst (Domain)|Thirst 5]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]], [[BoXM 12th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 12]], [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a pinch of dust)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Sandstorm (WotC), pg. 114

This spell functions like *[[Desiccate (Spell)|desiccate]]**,* except that it affects multiple creatures.
